oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Generals standing at entrance to Guest House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four men in military uniforms stand in front of a door with a sign over it, designating, "Guest House."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alexander Inn (Oak Ridge, Tenn.); Guest House; Hotels; Military uniforms; Soldiers
Brereton, Lewis H., 1890-1967; Groves, Leslie R., 1896-1970; Oliver, Lunsford E., 1889-1978; Taylor, Maxwell D. (Maxwell Davenport), 1901-1987
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of October 3, 1946 for an article about this meeting. From left to right, Oliver, Brereton, Taylor, and Groves. See also images ARM 0420 and ARM 0430.
3011; 9-30-1946; Maj. Gen Lunsford E. Oliver; Lt Gen Lewis H. Brereton; Maj Gen. Maxwell Taylor; Maj Gen. L. R. Groves
